Sentencas: A Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte Ce0.85Gd0.1Mg0.05O1.9 (CGM) was prepared by sol-gel method.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its conductivity behavior was studied and compared with those of singly doped ceria electrolytes Ce0.9Mg0.1O1.9 (CM10) and Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (CGO).
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By using CGM as the electrolyte, a fuel cell was fabricated with a Ni/CGM anode and a La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF)/CGM composite cathode.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its performance was compared with that of CGO based fuel cells.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both the CM10 and CGM electrolytes were ceria based solid solutions.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The dopant Mg2+ might be situated in the interstitials of the crystal lattice of CeO2.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The co-doped CGM showed a higher conductivity in air at 773-973 K in comparison to that of CGO and CMO.
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The CGM based fuel cell also showed higher open circuit voltage (OCV) and higher maximum power density (MPD) than the CGO based cell at 773-973 K. The MPD of the fuel cells were improved further by using composite cathode of LSCF/CGO (or CGM).
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With Ni/CGM anode and LSCF/CGM cathode, the MPD of the CGM based fuel cell at 873 K reached 202.5 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Study on Gd and Mg co-doped ceria electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
